scripts.build: next build --webpack && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && xcopy .open-next\assets\* .open-next\ /E /I /Y && rmdir /s /q .open-next\assets && move /Y .open-next\worker.js .open-next\_worker.js
scripts.build:worker: next build --webpack && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && xcopy .open-next\assets\* .open-next\ /E /I /Y && rmdir /s /q .open-next\assets && move /Y .open-next\worker.js .open-next\_worker.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler deploy
